text: The Bolivian Practical Shooting Federation, Spanish Federación Boliviana de Tíro Práctico (FBTP), is the Bolivian association for practical shooting under the International Practical Shooting Confederation.IPSC.org :: Regions == External links == * Official homepage of the Bolivian Practical Shooting Federation == References == Category:Regions of the International Practical Shooting Confederation Practical Shooting
title: Bolivian Practical Shooting Federation
